author: Anonymous Atom
title: Failed twice
question:
I just have a question, if I failed twice on this course, is there another way that I can redo this again?
Thanks
student_answer:
Good luck. See the link below:

https://www.cs.ubc.ca/undergrads/academic-advising/appeal-rules/appeals-course-failed-twice
instructor_answer: Rather than thinking about what happens if you fail a second time, I suggest you go to office hours and get help to pass the course this time.  There are lots this week! See @933
